name: Super Mario Molds You Bros.
description:
Welcome to Mario Molds You Bros. This is a game you want to play. Mario molds you, Mario molds you, Mario molds you, Mario molds you, Mario molds you. 

This game may feel like a virus game, but I promise you that it's not. 

Jokes aside, I'm happy with how this turned out. It's my first complete game project.
